channel.title: Sigh
channel.description: Ok so basically I'm messing around with EasyRSC just to have some fun.. I'm pretty sure I've got the port forward done,but people can't connect to the server,I've changed the settings,changed localhost to 196.168.*.*,along with pretty much everything I can think of for people to connect. Does anyone have some advice or know what I could possibly be doing wrong?

item.title: Sigh
item.dc:creator: @Slab Slab
item.description:
@Slab wrote:

you mean,windows firewall correct?

edit: fixed thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Sigh
item.dc:creator: @nate_o nate o
item.description:
@nate_o wrote:

Seems like a port-forward problem.
It could be as adu said. To solve this problem, disable any firewall. If this is the problem, then make sure you set your firewall to accept the port you have set.

Read full topic

item.title: Sigh
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Firewall might be blocking incomming traffic?

Read full topic
